jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Leads the Driver Swadaya department and collaborating product personnel in developing various product marketing initiatives
● Identify opportunities to develop new resources, plan, drive and develop go to market strategy for launch new campaigns that drive business growth
● Evaluate, track, improve and optimize existing products to maximize the adoption rate by redefining the target audience, marketing communications and branding, promotions, and channel distribution
● Explore marketing channels to target users
● Manage user communications through targeted channels such as email marketing, SMS, in-app notifications with a high quality and performance A/B testing to drive product growth
● Have to collaborate with multiple teams across the business, including sales and marketing department, the engineering department, product management, and PR
● Gaining insight into customer needs and experiences. Analysis of data, surveys and customer interviews will be part of this mix and you need to be well acquainted with these techniques

● Evaluate, track, improve and optimize existing products to maximize the adoption rate by redefining the target audience, marketing communications and branding, promotions, and channel distribution
● Explore marketing channels to target users
● Manage user communications through targeted channels such as email marketing, SMS, in-app notifications with a high quality and performance A/B testing to drive product growth

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Min 8 years of experience in marketing strategy or related field
  • Demonstrated passion and achievement in product marketing strategy and execution
  • Ability to work and communicate ideas clearly
  • Has a combination of the creative mind, strategic thinking, and analytics with the ability to cope with several projects at a time
  • The candidate must also demonstrate the ability to adapt, lead, and coach others in a fast-paced environment
